info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 8 at 11:01AM EDT until May 8 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia SC
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues.
* WHERE...A portion of central South Carolina, including the following county, Orangeburg.
* WHEN...Until 1245 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1058 AM EDT, Trained weather spotters reported heavy rain causing minor flooding of multiple streets in the city of Orangeburg. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will likely result in additional minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, South Carolina State University, Claflin College, Orangeburg County Airport, Edisto Gardens, Cordova, Wilkinson Heights, Prince of Orange Mall and Edisto. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Most flooding deaths occur in vehicles. Never drive through a flooded roadway or around barricades. Turn around, don't drown.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON
